trans-unit.source: If you're unfamiliar with the Sites framework, look for 'Sites' in the Django admin,
trans-unit.target: 如果你对Sites框架不熟悉,可以在Django管理中寻找 "Sites"。

trans-unit.source: It handles the confirmation process via a url in the confirmation message.
trans-unit.target: 它通过确认信息中的url处理确认过程。

trans-unit.source: It's important for this template to contain a link for the user to click on
trans-unit.target: 重要的是,这个模板要包含一个链接,让用户可以点击

trans-unit.source: Messages for unconfirmed addresses will be queued until the address is confirmed
trans-unit.target: 未确认地址的信息将被排队等候,直到地址被确认为止。

trans-unit.source: Provides an email sender that automatically confirms addresses.
trans-unit.target: 提供自动确认地址的电子邮件发送器。

trans-unit.source: The shortcut "send_mail_confirmed()" and class "ConfirmedEmailMessage" send email only
trans-unit.target: 快捷方式 "send_mail_confirmed()"和类 "ConfirmedEmailMessage "只发送邮件。

trans-unit.source: This allows you to display a message indicating that confirmation is necessary if appropriate.
trans-unit.target: 这允许你显示一条信息,表明在适当的时候需要确认。
